alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 09 at 8:53AM CDT until April 12 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in South Dakota... Split Rock Creek near Corson affecting Minnehaha County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Iowa... Rock River at Rock Rapids affecting Lyon County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...South Dakota... Flandreau Creek near Flandreau affecting Pipestone and Moody Counties. Sixmile Creek near Brookings affecting Brookings County. .Snow melt and increased reservoir releases will cause the river flows to become high. Expect minor flooding downstream from the dam. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rock River at Rock Rapids. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, the lower banks on the left side of the river will begin flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 14.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Rock River Rock Rapid 13.0 11.8 Sun 8 am 14.2 13.5 12.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 1100 AM CDT.
